about.title: Hello, my name is Guilherme Viana!
about.textTwo: developer with about three years of experience in
about.textFour: In my work, I mainly use
about.textSix: with experience in their respective frameworks
about.textEight: I am always looking to build clear and functional interfaces
about.textTwelve: , aiming for more robust and reliable code.
about.textThirteen: I enjoy turning complex problems into
about.textFourteen: and efficient solutions, always striving to deliver high-quality work.

consoleRevamp.title: Console Revamp
consoleRevamp.description: A console for internal operations of a Roleplay server team. It includes server metrics and analytics, user and team member management tools, and a dashboard with illustrative charts.

forumRoleplay.title: Roleplay Forum
forumRoleplay.description: A forum for a GTA Roleplay server. It includes a landing page, topic creation and viewing by categories, server announcements, player rankings by categories, custom profiles, and more.

forumRoleplayAPI.title: Roleplay Forum API
forumRoleplayAPI.description: API for the Roleplay Forum project. Fully documented, with unit and end-to-end tests to ensure greater reliability, following SOLID development principles and the Clean Architecture as main architecture.

chamaNoVar.title: Chama no Var
chamaNoVar.description: A challenge involving the recreation, adaptation, and improvement of a page inspired by the Varsel Agency landing page.

lowPixel.title: LowPixel
lowPixel.description: A platform built for a GTA roleplay server, including a landing page, online store, account settings panel, and other features.

ginteChallenge.title: Ginte Challenge
ginteChallenge.description: A full-stack challenge focused on building a modern, efficient, and scalable CRUD. Includes loading states, URL-based pagination, filters, search, real-time editing, caching, and more.

gameInventory.title: Game Inventory
gameInventory.description: A game inventory system with item categorization, advanced filtering, player trading system, and password-protected chests.

cashtrade.title: Cashtrade
cashtrade.description: A trading project. It automatically monitors trades and displays detailed charts, allowing high-control betting. It also includes analytical charts, a trade history with detailed graphs, a personal profile and account panel, in-platform support, and more. Outsourced freelance - © 2024 Varsel Agency. All rights reserved.

battleRoyale.title: Battle Royale
battleRoyale.description: A system for a GTA Battle Royale server. It includes a complete landing page, settings panel, clan panel, season ranking, and more. Outsourced freelance - © 2024 Varsel Agency. All rights reserved.

thoughts.title: Thoughts
thoughts.description: A personal project of a simple and modern full-stack blog.

thoughtsAPI.title: Thoughts API
thoughtsAPI.description: API for the Thoughts project. Fully documented and following SOLID development principles and the Clean Architecture as main architecture.

hellsAngels.title: Hells Angels MW
hellsAngels.description: A presentation website for a fictional motorcycle club in a roleplay game server.

bsplay.title: BSPlay
bsplay.description: Landing page for a financial management project. Outsourced freelance - © 2024 Varsel Agency. All rights reserved.

surfValley.title: Surf Valley
surfValley.description: Landing page for a GTA Roleplay server. Outsourced freelance - © 2024 Varsel Agency. All rights reserved.

projectTeller.title: Project Teller
projectTeller.description: A micro-SaaS platform for creating and sharing social media and projects with a single link. It includes a landing page, premium plans, custom profiles, and more.

crownForumAPI.title: Crown Forum API
crownForumAPI.description: A complete API for an extensive forum. Efficiently adheres to complex business rules. Fully documented, including unit and end-to-end tests to ensure greater reliability. Follows SOLID development principles, the DDD design pattern and the Clean Architecture as main architecture.

crownLabs.title: Crown Labs
crownLabs.description: A SaaS project for organization and project management, offering robust features for efficient team and initiative administration. It allows the creation and management of organizations, including adding and managing members. It also supports multiple project creation and administration, bringing greater flexibility and control for companies and teams.

bozoSaaS.title: BozoSaaS
bozoSaaS.description: A boilerplate for SaaS microservices, designed for a note management system. It includes a subscription plan, support for configurable themes, and other essential features for customization and scalability.

igniteTeams.title: Ignite Teams
igniteTeams.description: An app focused on managing groups and teams of any kind.

spaceGym.title: Space Gym
spaceGym.description: A project focused on fitness and bodybuilding. It includes an exercise listing with images, videos, and GIFs, exercise history, custom profiles, and more.

easyTransfer.title: Easy Transfer
easyTransfer.description: Freelance project for a landing page with on-demand contact, made for the company Easy Transfer.

academyAPI.title: Academy API
academyAPI.description: API for a gym. Efficiently adheres to complex business rules. The project includes unit and end-to-end tests to ensure greater reliability, following SOLID development principles and the Clean Architecture as main architecture.

findAFriendAPI.title: Find a Friend API
findAFriendAPI.description: API for a pet adoption project. The project includes unit and end-to-end tests to ensure greater reliability, following SOLID development principles and the Clean Architecture as main architecture.

constancy.title: Constancy App
constancy.description: A personal goals app. Allows users to track and create goals over different periods. It is a gamified system designed to encourage users to complete their goals with rewards and visual appeal.

constancyAPI.title: Constancy API
constancyAPI.description: API for the personal goals app (Constancy). Fully documented project.

bookwise.title: Bookwise
bookwise.description: A platform for book reviews. Full-stack application challenge.

gespol.title: Gespol
gespol.description: A police management system for internal use within the corporation.

pizzaShop.title: Pizza Shop
pizzaShop.description: A pizza shop with an order table, order status management, store charts, multi-theme support, and more.

coursePlayer.title: Course Player
coursePlayer.description: A video player for course videos. Built using Redux, Zustand, and other advanced concepts.

githubBlog.title: GitHub Blog
githubBlog.description: A project focused on displaying GitHub repository issues in a blog format. Built using the GitHub API.

dietAPI.title: Diet API
dietAPI.description: Challenge for creating an API to manage diets.

coffeeDelivery.title: Coffee Delivery
coffeeDelivery.description: A virtual coffee shop project, from coffee selection to checkout and order confirmation.

designSystem.title: Design System
designSystem.description: A design system with standardized elements, colors, typography, and more. Created using Storybook.

tabelaTransacoes.title: Transaction Table
tabelaTransacoes.description: A simple challenge to create a table with transactions.

igniteCall.title: Ignite Call
igniteCall.description: A scheduling system integrated with Google Calendar for service providers.

rocketNotes.title: Rocket Notes
rocketNotes.description: A note-taking platform project with individual profiles, note management, and more.

rocketNotesAPI.title: Rocket Notes API
rocketNotesAPI.description: Node.js back-end for the Rocket Notes application. Covers authentication flow and database storage for notes, users, and their settings.

devstore.title: Dev Store
devstore.description: A mini clothing e-commerce. Currently a basic project with no payment integration.

expertNotes.title: Expert Notes
expertNotes.description: A note-taking application with a Text-to-Speech option.

pollsAPI.title: Polls API
pollsAPI.description: Back-end for a polling system. Allows voting on poll options and retrieving vote results.

igniteFeed.title: Ignite Feed
igniteFeed.description: A social network project with a feed and individual profiles.

igniteShop.title: Ignite Shop
igniteShop.description: A clothing e-commerce project with Stripe integration, a checkout page, and purchase confirmation.

dtMoney.title: DT Money
dtMoney.description: A transaction management system with an operation history.

pizzaStore.title: Pizza Store
pizzaStore.description: A virtual pizza store with a cart and pizza selection.

bmiCalculator.title: BMI Calculator
bmiCalculator.description: A BMI calculator where users can enter their height and weight to receive a result with feedback.

cardastro.title: Cardastro
cardastro.description: A vehicle registration panel with a complete CRUD process.

devMemory.title: Dev Memory
devMemory.description: A memory game with different cards and always randomized rounds and positions.

todoList.title: To-do List
todoList.description: A to-do list where users can add new tasks, mark them as completed, etc.

postList.title: Post List
postList.description: A simple post list that allows CRUD operations on posts.

trainMe.title: Train Me
trainMe.description: A landing page for a gym.

newsletterForm.title: Newsletter Form
newsletterForm.description: An interface with a form to receive newsletter notifications.

qrCodeComponent.title: QR Code Component
qrCodeComponent.description: A simple interface with a QR Code.

simpleChat.title: Simple Chat
simpleChat.description: A chat app that allows users to set a username and send messages locally.

climeVisualizer.title: Clime Visualizer
climeVisualizer.description: A weather visualizer that uses an API and allows users to enter a location to check the weather.

ticTacToe.title: Tic Tac Toe
ticTacToe.description: A tic-tac-toe game where players can play locally.

quizGame.title: Quiz Game
quizGame.description: A quiz game with predefined questions and answers, providing feedback on the final result.

batteryPlay.title: Battery Play
batteryPlay.description: A functional drum player with sounds, sound sequences, keyboard activation, etc.

dragAndDrop.title: Drag & Drop
dragAndDrop.description: A drag-and-drop project that allows dragging objects from point X to point Y.

analogicalWatch.title: Analog Watch
analogicalWatch.description: A functional analog watch with dynamic hands.
